short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all images on web pages with your uploaded image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InstaSwap is a sleek and fun Chrome extension that lets you transform your browsing experience by swapping all images on any webpage with a custom image of your choice. Just upload your favorite picture, hit "Start," and watch every page you visit change instantly. Whether for fun, personalization, or just a change of scenery, InstaSwap runs smoothly across sites and keeps going until you decide to stop.
